title: Strengthening Continuous Learning Competencies Through Digital Learning Space Experiences

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Asynchronous learning-centered design, establishing a feedback system to enhance self-efficacy in virtual environments

learning_goals: Learners achieve an 80% or higher task completion rate using asynchronous activities in digital learning spaces.
Learners achieve a user satisfaction rating of 4.0/5.0 or higher while performing collaborative projects in virtual simulation environments.
After VR-based learning experiences, learners demonstrate a 20% or greater improvement in scores on the Virtual Self-Efficacy Scale.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
